name: Frank Green
message: I have a question about your halal certification process. Can you provide more details on the auditing bodies you work with?

name: Grace Hall
message: Your website mentions East Africa. Do you source from specific regions or farms? We are very interested in ethical sourcing.

name: Henry King
message: I'd like to inquire about partnership opportunities for distribution in the Middle East. Please contact me to discuss further.

name: Ivy Lee
message: Can you provide information on the nutritional value of your beef products? Specifically, I'm looking for grass-fed data.

name: Jack White
message: I encountered an issue with a recent delivery. The packaging was damaged. Please advise on your return policy.
